page.title: 07C.0F E AND METHODIST CHURCH
page.content: The Church of St. Mary The Virgin, Riddlesden, is 134 years old. It was opened in 1848 on the 6th January and was started in 1847. Mr. Smith is the priest of the church at the moment , his services are on Sundays 8 a.m., 10 a.m family communion, 6.30 p.m.(but earlier in winter). The Methodist Church is 102 years old but the first Methodist church was opened 194 years ago on 20th June 1883. Mr. Hopkins, the Minister, has local preachers who sometimes take his services, which are on Sunday at 10.30am and 6 pm. He has 4 more Churches to look after, Long Lee, Sandbeds, Laycock and East Morton. He has weddings and baptisms, but not many funerals. The Church has Sunday School and many clubs.
